#Text= Tenzin says : " Then we have to break through the enemy lines ourselves and get to the portal now .

column1: #Text=" Korra says : " There 's no use in talking any more .
#Text=We know what our mission is .
#Text=" Bolin says : " A suicide mission ... " Bumi says : " You know , I was in a similar situation once .
#Text=My platoon had crawled through the desert with no water for a week !
#Text=But when we finally located the only oasis for a hundred miles , it was surrounded by angry sandbenders .
#Text=I realized our only chance to get to the water was to drop in from above .
#Text=So I fashioned together a catapult , and with the help of a few well - trained hog monkeys ... " Tenzin says : " Enough of your ridiculous lies !
#Text=Ca n't you see that the fate of the world and Jinora 's life depends on what we do here today ?!
#Text=" Asami says : " Hold on , maybe Bumi 's right .
#Text=We do n't have a catapult and hog monkeys , but we have a flying bison and there 's a plane on Varrick 's ship .
#Text=Maybe we can attack from above .
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you thinking ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Mako , Bolin and I can use the plane to create a distraction , and scatter some of the defenses .
#Text=You , Tenzin , Bumi and Kya can fly into the spirit portal on Oogi when you see an opening .
#Text=" Korra says : " Let 's get moving .
#Text="
